postgresTableNames.note: The map has two layers, an outer block layer and inner parcel layer; the parcel layer displays within a block on the block layer
postgresTableNames.instructions: Specify the names of the tables in postgres that correspond to the two layers

sliders.label: Tree Cover (%)
sliders.name: treeCover
sliders.description: The percentage of canopy (tree) cover over an area

sliders.label: Urban Heat Index
sliders.name: urbanHeatIndex
sliders.description: A measure of the degree of the Heat Island Effect, where higher values indicate higher temperatures compared to surrounding rural areas

sliders.label: Air Pollution Index
sliders.name: airPollutionIndex
sliders.description: A measure of the quality of air

sliders.label: Median Household Income
sliders.name: medianIncome
sliders.description: The median household income in U.S. dollars

sliders.label: BIPOC (%)
sliders.name: bipoc
sliders.description: The percentage of residents who are Black, Indigenous, or People of Color

mapboxPublicTokenNote: There is no way to prevent exposing mapboxPublicToken to users of the site, but URL restrictions can be set up to limit usage
privateApiKey: Private API keys are stored as environment variables to prevent exposure
connectionString: The database connection string must be stored in the 'DATABASE_URL' environment variable
